statements: UPDATE transaction_fees SET fee_percentage = 2.5 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE transaction_fees SET transaction_amount = 500.00, sender_user_id = 101, receiver_user_id = 102 WHERE transaction_id = 1002;
UPDATE transaction_fees SET fee_percentage = 0.05, sender_user_id = 1001 WHERE transaction_id = 205;
UPDATE transaction_fees SET receiver_user_id = 2002, transaction_amount = 500.00 WHERE sender_user_id = 1002;
UPDATE transaction SET amount = 5000.50, fee = 100.75 WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE fee_calculation SET fee_percentage = 0.05, calculated_fee = 250.25 WHERE calculation_id = 54321;
UPDATE transaction SET amount = 500.25, fee = 10.50 WHERE transaction_id = 100;

UPDATE fee_calculation SET fee_percentage = 2.5, calculated_fee = amount * fee_percentage FROM fee_calculation JOIN transaction ON fee_calculation.transaction_id = transaction.transaction_id WHERE fee_calculation.calculation_id = 50;
UPDATE transactions SET fee_amount = 10.5 WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET account_balance = 5000.75 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE transaction_fees SET amount = 15.99, currency = 'USD' WHERE payment_id = 1234;
UPDATE users SET account_balance = account_balance - 100.50, user_name = 'Alice' WHERE user_id = 5678;
UPDATE users SET username='john_doe', balance=100.50 WHERE user_id=1
UPDATE transactions SET fee=2.50, timestamp='2023-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE transaction_id=5
UPDATE users SET balance = balance + 100.00 WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE payment_methods SET fee_rate = 2.50 WHERE user_id = 3
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount + 100 WHERE transaction_id = '1a89bc4a-ebcb-4e79-bf97-651265bf5097';
UPDATE users SET balance = balance - 50.25, username = 'new_username' WHERE user_id = '2b0c61ac-e678-4732-8b6b-0c4f5870e22b';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = amount - 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET balance = balance + 50.75 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
